scripts.stopContainer: docker rm -f court-booking-system-build-container && docker image prune -f && docker container prune -f
scripts.build: npm run removeDist && npm run dockerBuild && npm run dockerRun && npm run fetchDist && npm run copyStaticFiles && npm run stopContainer
scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env HP_INSTANCE_IMAGE=evernode/sashimono:hp.0.6.4-ubt.20.04-njs.20 hpdevkit deploy dist
scripts.startLinux: npm run build1 && export HP_INSTANCE_IMAGE=evernodedev/sashimono:hp.0.6.4-ubt.20.04-njs.20 && hpdevkit deploy dist
scripts.build1: rimraf dist && npx ncc build ./src/startup.js -o dist && cp src/settings.json dist && cp hp.cfg.override dist
